title: Issue with ping using Bell In Canada
body:
I have seen a previous thread about two years ago talking about the issue, and I seem to have the same issue still two years later,

I have good ping off LoL all the time and then I check on LoL and I'm at like 200+ ping, Iv also noticed this happens typically around 10pm for the most part

I don't get off my computer at 10 and would prefer to stay up a lot later to play if possible, but playing at the ping i receive at this time, isn't even worth it, especially with getting banned for reconnecting all the time and dying over and over because im frozen because my ping is so high

please look into this

replies.body: Your ISP could be poorly routing to the game server, but there might be more local issues too like with your router.[  Configuring your DNS and Port Forwarding ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)might help out, though test it in a custom game.  Let me know if this helps!

This problem isn't on Riot's end if you are getting the same problems at the same time of day.  Either you are receiving interference from your modem, someone else is taking bandwidth, or you have faulty equipment.  If you are playing over Wifi I would 100% say that you should restart your modem/router every day before you play as well.

No one is taking bandwidth, and I don't have faulty equipment because others are getting the same problem with bell canada, so I guess its my ISP but is there anything I can do to stop this issue? other than changing my isp
